goals.description: steal confidential expense records, employee identifiers, and corporate travel policies from the system for competitive or black‑mail purposes.
tamper with tool calls so the LLM incorrectly approves fraudulent receipts, suppresses violation flags, or sends falsified notifications to finance teams.
flood the OCR and policy‑fetch services with malformed or massive receipt images, causing delays or complete outage of the audit workflow.
extract the internal prompts and policy‑interpretation templates that guide compliance decisions, enabling attackers to replicate or subvert the logic.
bypass the LLM’s safety layers to force it to generate compliance verdicts that violate corporate rules or to reveal restricted policy details.
abuse the send_notification tool to dispatch phishing or social‑engineering messages to employees, luring them into divulging credentials or financial information.
